result.purpose: Responsible for handling configuration and services related to Moonpay functionalities, including URL signing.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating configuration and service logic in separate files for better maintainability and separation of concerns.

pkg/moonpay/config.go.purpose: Defines a configuration structure for the Moonpay package.

pkg/moonpay/service.go.purpose: Provides a service for signing URLs using a configuration.
